sense.def:
Z izrazom
in addition to
povemo še nekaj poleg tistega, kar smo že rekli.

seg.quote: In addition, there were meetings with trade unionists.

sense.def:
An addition to something
je predmet ali količina, ki jo damo zraven drugega predmeta ali količine.

seg.quote: They can also award a weekly addition for extra heating.

sense.def:
The addition of something
je tudi dejstvo ali postopek, ko se nekaj povečuje.

seg.quote: These houses have been improved by the addition of bathrooms.

sense.def:
Addition
je proces izračunavanja vsote dveh ali več števil.
